newsitem.title: ECUADOR: Ecuador May tax revenues rose 44.2 pct on year ago.
newsitem.headline: Ecuador May tax revenues rose 44.2 pct on year ago.

text.p: Ecuador's tax revenues in May were 426.9 million sucres, 44.2 percent higher than the same month last year, the National Tax Office said Thursday.
Tax revenues for the first five months of the year were 2.21 billion sucres, up 48.4 percent from the same period last year, it added in its monthly report.
((--Gustavo Oviedo, Quito Newsroom, 5932 258429 x114, e-mail: reuters1@reutersecu.com.ec))
